content.webTitle: Rugby league: Hardman joins Hull KR

fields.headline: Hull KR borrow Hardman for flair in place of Ford
fields.bodyText: Hull Kingston Rovers have taken the St Helens full-back Ian Hardman on a month's loan. The 21-year-old, who has played 46 first-team games for Saints but only two this season, is set to cover for the injured Byron Ford at Bradford on Sunday. Ford will be missing for two weeks with a knee injury sustained in the derby match with Hull FC on Monday. "Ian is a player of great ability and he will add a touch of flair to our backs," said the Hull KR coach, Justin Morgan, who is now hoping to add a forward signing to his squad before the weekend. Leeds Rhinos have lost their New Zealand second-row Ali Lauitiiti for the remainder of April after tests revealed a medial ligament strain.
